comments:
Build 20030307

I checked the org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui project out of the repository, fixed
a bug, right clicked on the plugin.xml and generated the build.xml file.
Then I right clicked on the file and choose Run Ant... The launch config
dialog opened, I clicked Run, and the following NPE occurred:
